sources.title: True Stories (1986) (ESP sub)
sources.description: A small but growing Texas town, filled with strange and musical characters, celebrates its sesquicentennial and converge on a local parade and talent show.

metadata.Plot: David Byrne of Talking Heads fame visits a typical (and fictional) Texas town, on the eve of the town's celebration of the state's sesquicentennial. He meets various colorful local characters, most notably Lewis Fyne, a big-hearted bachelor in search of matrimony.
metadata.Writer: Stephen Tobolowsky, Beth Henley, David Byrne
metadata.Actors: David Byrne, John Goodman, Annie McEnroe
